reviews.text: Nice place to take your healthy lunch after a hard day walking in Barcelona. You can take a cooffe later for free in Nespreso

Very nice place for shopping, not too big but shoe places, kids shops for dress, design dresses, great tea shop, a very nice grocery, next to Nespresso shop and very nice food shop also there.
Visit and sure find some stuff

Got a gorgeous dress in Outlet store and such a pretty outfit for my 3 year old girl in designer shop which had great sale.
Also got my shoes re-heeled for later!
Convenient,lots choice
The best shopping center in Barcelona! Lots of small boutiques offering individual shoes, clothes and jewelry. Super clean toilets too :)
